name: Jad
description:
In the game you have to jump, push off walls and Electra accelerators. The protagonist JAD is a distant relative of AVA.

JAD is the most advanced and agile inhabitant of the planet Koitii.

Game features:
  • Dangerous saws
  • Jumping from walls and boosters
  • Jigsaw puzzles
  • Convenient management
  • Difficult levels
